Posts.Content: May 9, 2011 11:40AM kjo wrote: BarbaraA,  Thank you for your response.... The waiting is so difficult... I just want to move forward and take care of it by whatever means seems most logical to the doctors and myself.
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed... scared.... kjo bcisnofun

Posts.Content: kjo wrote: Had mammo in January - clear Had physical in March - clear  Did self exam on Monday, May 2. Found lump in lower left breast. Went to OBGYN on Tuesday, referred to radiologist (told 90% sure fibro) Went to radiologist on Wed. Had mammo, ultras, needle biopsy of 5 samples... Driving home from work on Thursday, received phone call to tell me positive... WEEKEND WAS HORRIBLE Going to see surgeon today at 1:30p ET. Told may have to wait on MRI based on menstrual cycle. No family history... Prayers needed...  Love to all.. kelly Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed... scared.... kjo bcisnofun
